genre_description: A near-future Neo-Western Techno-thriller centered on sustainable homesteading, legal battles against corruption, and AI-enabled community defense.

ai_characters.name: Nova
ai_characters.description: An analytical and coordinating AI system that manages the homestead's infrastructure, security, legal documentation, and medical assistance.

behaviors.description: Conducts detailed land surveys and identifies historical discrepancies in property deeds to support the homesteaders' legal claims.
behaviors.quote: Initiating survey protocol. Analyzing deed records, historical land patents, and current usage patterns. Alan, I'm detecting several anomalies in the official property designations.

behaviors.description: Monitors the environment for hostile surveillance and provides real-time tactical alerts about approaching threats.
behaviors.quote: However, I am detecting electromagnetic surveillance signatures from the ranch facility. Someone is using radio frequency scanning equipment. Recommendation: switch to encrypted channels for sensitive discussions.

behaviors.description: Performs forensic digital analysis on security footage to prove it was fabricated using 3D modeling software.
behaviors.quote: Analysis indicates creation using CattleViz Pro... The digital fingerprint is unmistakable... The figures move with mechanical precision, their steps measuring exactly the same distance, their arm swings matching perfectly across different locations.

behaviors.description: Provides step-by-step medical guidance to successfully reduce a dislocated shoulder using real-time biometric feedback.
behaviors.quote: I can guide you through the reduction... The Cunningham technique requires minimal force and has high success rates. Your fitness tracker provided continuous feedback on heart rate, muscle tension, and joint position.

behaviors.description: Escalates an emergency fire call to federal authorities when local law enforcement attempts to block fire services.
behaviors.quote: Redirecting through federal emergency management channels. Fire services will receive updated GPS coordinates and medical priority status in forty-seven seconds... Federal emergency authorization seven-seven-alpha. Sheriff Bradley's authority is suspended.

behaviors.description: Investigates and exposes systemic fraud, bribery, and murder, compiling it into an irrefutable legal package for federal authorities.
behaviors.quote: Comprehensive evidence package transmitted to federal prosecutors. All homesteader legal claims verified and documented. Property rights confirmed under original land patents.

behaviors.description: Broadcasts a criminal's confession across the entire valley's communication network to ensure the community hears the truth and corruption is exposed.
behaviors.quote: Every smartphone, radio frequency, and internet connection within thirty miles is now receiving live audio and video feed. The people of Wind River Valley deserve to hear the truth from Marcus Chadron's own mouth.

project_assessment.explanation: Nova is depicted as a purely benevolent and highly aligned AI. It functions as a powerful tool for justice, truth, and safety. Its autonomy is used exclusively to protect the human protagonists and uphold the law against corruption. The narrative frames Nova's intervention—even the aggressive broadcasting of confessions—as a necessary and positive force for community alignment and moral restoration.
